content: About 24 hours to go before content, and we have serious problems. @all. Please review this ASAP
pasted image

that summary I just prepared. We have the following problems:

  • BSeR is on the ballot desktop, but not announced
  • we have a chronic inability to get US vs UV correct - almost all US guides are wrong. THis is a disgrace
  • 4 of the guides being balloted have not been built on CI-Build ever. One not for 4 weeks
  • One - SDC - is delayed... Lloyd said one other but I haven't checked which
  • we don't have approved IG proposals for some of them - I presume they are being grandfathered, but I'm guessing at some information for them
  • I believe I remember that SDC is going to be UV this time... but haven't quickly found anything in writing about that
SDC is going to be UV. It was agreed The new PSS makes this explicit. If it needs to be written elsewhere, tell me where.
BSeR was announced in a supplemental notification
davinc-crd shows pink for "us". Why? It's definitely a US IG...
found it
didn't find it in the wiki with general search, and don't have an IG proposal
PRO is delayed with SDC for sure. CRN will likely be delayed to the same timeframe, but BR&R won't officially confirm that until Tue.
The only ones grandfathered are those you've published previously
yes but I wanted to be sure
I think we agreed that eCR would be US not UV next time. TSC thought I was weird when I got confused about US vs UV, but what do you know.... we have 5 US IGs announced for UV ballot.

Didn't create an IGProposal for SDC because it's been previously published (and balloted) a few times, so I presumed it was grandfathered. Do you need an IGProposal in order to transfer from US to UV?
(And why is davinci-crd pink on 'us' - did it show up in the UV ballot? Pretty sure the NIB was correct and the PSS definitely was...
left column shows how it was announced. Only ecr was announced as US specific
I don't need a proposal for the grandfathered ones. we'll back patch as necessary
Announcements were Lynn's error. I've let her know. She's asked for a list of the wrong ones.
which brings us to the IGs that are not in progress...
You mean the delayed open ones?
SDC PRO and CRN are delayed. ok.
that still leaves PDDI and CDMH
I've pinged Dragon on CDMH. Who's PDDI? Bryn?
I don't know
PDDI is Bryn. I've pinged him too.
VhDir is PA for sure.
Approved = GF?
PA discussed the IG on our call yesterday and we believed was good to go (with the bit of cleanup we had) but didn't believe it needed a vote - was that assumption wrong?
no. that's FMG process I'm tracking. THere's no formal approval but it's grandfathered in since before we had the proposal system
